main event: A civilian pilot observed a round, reddish-white object near Riverside, California on June 17, 1955.
interesting points: The object was the size of a disc and was observed for 3 minutes.
The object appeared to go straight up and then disappeared over the horizon.
The characteristics of the object coincided with those of a balloon.
The observer stated the object appeared and disappeared at the same point.
No investigation was authorized by the headquarters.
